name: Slashbang!
description:
IF YOUR CONTROLS DON'T WORK, PRESS F1/F2 TO RESET KEYBOARD CONTROLS

ALSO, YOU CAN REBIND IN ANY MENU OUTSIDE OF GAMEPAD ASSIGN (THE STARTING MENU)

I recommend listening to tunes while playing: https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLfiJJRuOQhPqj_hB_W6Rmucgb3QzHGcJE

https://github.com/MatthewRobo/lets-go-justin

https://twitter.com/HiFightTH/status/1337930637597057025

Keyboard 1Keyboard 2Start17Select28MovementWASDIJKLSlash (A)F[Shoot (B)G]Parry (C)H\Jump (J)C;
